objects.description: [FlexiSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0408) uses root access to establish reboot hooks to re-install the application from `/data/misc/adn`.(Citation: FortiGuard-FlexiSpy) At boot, [FlexiSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0408) spawns daemons for process monitoring, call monitoring, call managing, and system.(Citation: FortiGuard-FlexiSpy)

external_references.description: K. Lu. (n.d.). Deep Technical Analysis of the Spyware FlexiSpy for Android. Retrieved September 10, 2019.
